about_the_game:
Fight, Loot, Craft, and Level Up!
A Hunter's Tale" is an RPG dungeon crawler where you'll craft potions, level up, and face colossal monsters with distinct weapons, each imbued with unique abilities. Delve into the secrets of Fuji, the realm of hunters, and uncover the truth behind the mysterious island you now inhabit.

In the game, players can craft potions by combining different components, resulting in a variety of effects. By mixing ingredients like herbs, minerals, and magical essences, you can create potions that enhance your health, boost your strength, agility, vitality, resilience, and intellect. Experiment with different combinations and discover the powerful effects each potion can provide.


In the game, players engage in battles against a diverse array of monsters, ranging from ordinary foes to towering boss adversaries. Discover hidden bosses scattered throughout the world and defeat them to obtain elusive secret weapons.


With a multitude of weapons at your disposal, each boasting its own unique abilities, you'll strategize and adapt your fighting style to overcome every challenge the game throws your way.


Upon leveling up, you customize your character's growth by allocating stat points, tailoring your strengths to match your chosen playstyle.


After defeating a monster, the loot it drops has dynamic prices that change with each dungeon run. You can sell these items for gems, which you can then use to purchase potions, ingredients, or upgrade your weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Touch

short_description: Explore Fuji's mysteries in this VR RPG adventure. Battle massive beasts, conquer challenges, and grow stronger with each encounter.
supported_languages: English, Arabic, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
